name: Grottesco Absurdus
description:
It's a fair deal! Join us!

Grottesco Absurdus is a surreal story, consisting of fun mini-games in different genres.

  • Top-down shooter.
  • Side-scrolling shooter.
  • Quest.
  • Puzzle.
  • 2D hardcore platformer.
  • Casual.
  • Arcade.

Would you like to know what is waiting for you here? Your adventure is going to be fun and one of a kind!

  • More than 7 game worlds.
  • Dozens of various heroes.
  • Different game techniques and visual styles.
  • Pixel and hand-drawn animation.
  • Simple mouse control, easy for any age.
  • Authentic music ranged from 8-bit compositions to blues guitar parts.
  • Including original soundtrack.

Grottesco Absurdus is the perfect cure for boredom and depression for the best price!
